segments.text: Well , the way you drive , Jen ... I still don't think that's a good idea .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really love this music . It's a compilation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . It's a mix of all the latest songs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you got them off the Net ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I recorded these from your Cds .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , thanks for asking for my permission ... Now hand it over and let me record !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I knew I shouldn't have shown you my new toy ...
segments.speaker: S1
